name: Maruchan Chicken
bodyText: This is a noodle that most Americans have tried. It’s always stocked somewhere in any grocery store...

name: Top Ramen Chicken
bodyText: Basically Maruchan Chicken, but with a slight difference in flavor...

name: Indomie Chicken Curry
bodyText: This noodle has a lot to offer in the way of spices and flavor...

name: Mama Chand Clear Soup
bodyText: It’s actually really spicy despite its unassuming look...

name: Myojo Beef Udon
bodyText: It’s good if you grew up eating Play-Doh...

name: Mama Pa-Lo Duck
bodyText: This soup is one of my favorites by Mama...

name: Mama Shrimp Creamy
bodyText: One of the only Mama noodles I dislike due to its excessive shrimpiness...

name: Mama Rice Vermicelli
bodyText: A lot like the Mama Chand Clear Soup in terms of flavor and spice, but with new noodles...

name: Snapdragon Beef Pho
bodyText: Would be good if it wasn't for the excessive ginger...

name: Vifon Chicken Pho
bodyText: Great broth flavor. Tastes almost like it came out of a restaurant...
